title: Finding and Losing Meaning through Military Community
description:
The armed forces can provide a bonding experience that has become increasingly rare in Western society. As individuals we voluntarily give up for the sake of national defense much of what we jealously guard as private citizens. This makes an interesting case study for the Meaning Crisis. 

San Diego, evangelical, legalistic, Calvary chapel, homeschooled
Non-denominational churches
EV Free church
Non-denom is like a box of chocolates
How we absorb things in church
Not many Christian professors in college
Too difficult NOT TO believe…
Seattle culture
Oklahoma
Meaning crisis
Army for 6 years
A lot in the military are dealing with it now
Had meaning and clearly defined sense of purpose in the military
Loss of meaning after leaving military
John Cougar Mellencamp Glory Days
Building the altar for God to light the fire
Wild at Heart by John Elderidge
Church shopping advice
Tribe by Sebastion Junger
Wars are a futile endeavor
Afghanistan
Happy people in Afghanistan
Marie Kondo
 Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.
